name: Moto Bikers - Play Pixel 8-bit Bike Racing Games for Free
name_original: Moto Bikers - Play Pixel 8-bit Bike Racing Games for Free
description:
Moto Bikers are riding the track on this awesome day... Try to jump through as many obstacles as you possibly can. Compete with other players in Game Center. Try to beat your high score and share it on Facebook and Twitter.

Great Game!

Game Features:

* 8-bit art style and retro look
* Play with just one tap
* Very fast and challenging game play
* Easy to play, but hard to master
* Game Center integrated for more fun
* FREE... everything is there at no price

You may think it’s just another running, flying, jumping, or endless race game. But this nice tiny indie game is a bit different…
